title: Mercury Transit in the 12th House for Cancer Ascendant
summary: Mercury transiting the twelfth house turns thinking inward toward reflection, solitude, and subconscious processing. For Cancer ascendants, this phase heightens mental sensitivity and draws attention to private matters, rest, and behind-the-scenes planning. Communication becomes subtle, with benefits from research, writing in isolation, or foreign connections. While insight deepens, excessive rumination or mental withdrawal can reduce clarity. This transit favors quiet analysis, spiritual study, and conscious rest, allowing the mind to reset and prepare for the next outward cycle.

sections.heading: Career
points: Research, analysis, or writing in isolation
Support for foreign or remote projects

sections.heading: Finance
points: Expenses on travel, learning, or healing

closing:
This transit supports clarity through conscious withdrawal.
Use Mercury to reflect, not retreat from awareness.
Quiet insight prepares the next phase of action.
